title: One Trick Pony or Jack of All Trades?
body:
Are you a One Trick Pony or a Jack of All Trades? What's your opinion?

I am pretty bias about this since I got from Gold to Diamond by spamming Vlad with a 70% win rate.

My theroy was:

Champion stats reset after every game. Champion knowledge and skill doesn't. Pick a champion and stick to your guns.

It worked for me, what works for you? I'm curious.
